https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xf81BLFGy22QqI03Z2Yte5jqv32.jpg During the 2004 presidential election, Michael Moore set off on a 60 city tour (mostly colleges), making stops in the 20 battleground states, to help raise voting awareness. Captain Mike Across America
